events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because the product doesn’t match what I ordered at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for resolution and follow-up with the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Can you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you also share photos of the item you received and the packing slip, please?
Sure, here is my order number 987654321 and attached are photos showing the wrong product I got instead.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label to send back the incorrect item.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate how quickly you are handling this and look forward to receiving the return label.
We have sent the prepaid return shipping label to your email. Once we receive the item back, your refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the return label and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and no further issues remain, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
